trans-unit.source: Provides a simple default implementation of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: 提供的一个简单的默认实现<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor"></xref>接口。

trans-unit.source: Like <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider>, the CustomTypeDescriptor class relies on a parent object of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> supplied during construction.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider>，CustomTypeDescriptor 类依赖于类型的父对象<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor>构造过程中提供。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider>

trans-unit.source: This allows classes that derive from CustomTypeDescriptor to selectively override methods.
trans-unit.target: 这允许从 CustomTypeDescriptor 有选择地重写方法派生的类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is equivalent to calling the other <xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> constructor with a parameter that is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数等效于调用的其他<xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>构造函数的参数与`null`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: All methods of a <xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor> created with this constructor will return default values.
trans-unit.target: 所有方法<xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor>创建与此构造函数将返回默认值。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor"></xref> class using a parent custom type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor"></xref>类使用父自定义类型描述符。

trans-unit.source: If the `parent` parameter is `null`, all <xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor> methods will return default values.
trans-unit.target: 如果`parent`参数是`null`，所有<xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor>方法将返回默认值。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, all <xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor> methods will delegate to the methods of `parent`.
trans-unit.target: 否则为所有<xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor>方法会将对方法的委托`parent`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: Most <xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor> methods return `null` by default.
trans-unit.target: 大多数<xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor>方法返回`null`默认情况下。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the return values for the methods that do not return `null` by default.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示不会返回的方法的返回值`null`默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: |Method|Default return value| |------------|--------------------------| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.GetAttributes%2A>|An empty attribute collection (<xref:System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>).| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A>|The default <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> instance.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.GetEvents%2A>|An empty events collection (<xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>).| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A>|An empty property collection (<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>).|
trans-unit.target: |方法 |默认返回值 | |------------|--------------------------| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.GetAttributes%2A>|空的属性集合 (<xref:System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>)。 | |<xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A>|默认值<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>实例。 | |<xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.GetEvents%2A>|一个空的事件集合 (<xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>)。 | |<xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A>|空的属性集合 (<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>)。 |</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.GetEvents%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.GetAttributes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The parent custom type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 父自定义类型描述符。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of custom attributes for the type represented by this type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示此类型描述符的类型的自定义特性的集合。

trans-unit.source: If a parent custom type descriptor was passed to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A> constructor, the GetAttributes method will call the parent's corresponding method.
trans-unit.target: 如果父自定义类型描述符传递给<xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A>构造函数，GetAttributes 方法将调用父级的相应方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection"></xref> containing the attributes for the type.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection"> </xref>包含类型的属性。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the fully qualified name of the class represented by this type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示此类型描述符的类的完全限定的名称。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > GetClassName is not a static method and thus, is not guaranteed to be thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]1> GetClassName 不是静态方法，因此，不能保证是线程安全的。

trans-unit.source: If a parent custom type descriptor was passed to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A> constructor, the GetClassName method will call the parent's corresponding method.
trans-unit.target: 如果父自定义类型描述符传递给<xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A>构造函数，GetClassName 方法将调用父级的相应方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the fully qualified class name of the type this type descriptor is describing.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含描述此类型描述符的类型的完全限定的类名。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the class represented by this type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示此类型描述符的类的名称。

trans-unit.source: If a parent custom type descriptor was passed to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A> constructor, the GetComponentName method will call the parent's corresponding method.
trans-unit.target: 如果父自定义类型描述符传递给<xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A>构造函数，GetComponentName 方法将调用父级的相应方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the name of the component instance this type descriptor is describing.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含描述此类型描述符的组件实例的名称。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a type converter for the type represented by this type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示此类型描述符的类型的类型转换器。

trans-unit.source: If a parent custom type descriptor was passed into the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A> constructor, the GetConverter method will call the parent's corresponding method.
trans-unit.target: 如果父自定义类型描述符已传递到<xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A>构造函数，GetConverter 方法将调用父级的相应方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref> for the type represented by this type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"> </xref>此类型描述符所代表的类型。

trans-unit.source: The default is a newly created <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是新创建<xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the event descriptor for the default event of the object represented by this type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示此类型描述符的对象的默认事件的事件描述符。

trans-unit.source: If a parent custom type descriptor was passed into the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A> constructor, the GetDefaultEvent method will call the parent's corresponding method.
trans-unit.target: 如果父自定义类型描述符已传递到<xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A>构造函数，GetDefaultEvent 方法将调用父级的相应方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"></xref> for the default event on the object represented by this type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"> </xref>为表示此类型描述符的对象上的默认事件。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the property descriptor for the default property of the object represented by this type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示此类型描述符的对象的默认属性的属性描述符。

trans-unit.source: If a parent custom type descriptor was passed into the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A> constructor, the GetDefaultProperty method will call the parent's corresponding method.
trans-unit.target: 如果父自定义类型描述符已传递到<xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A>构造函数，GetDefaultProperty 方法将调用父级的相应方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> for the default property on the object represented by this type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>表示此类型描述符的对象上的默认属性。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns an editor of the specified type that is to be associated with the class represented by this type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定要与此类型描述符所表示的类关联的类型的编辑器。

trans-unit.source: If a parent custom type descriptor was passed into the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A> constructor, the GetEditor method will call the parent's corresponding method.
trans-unit.target: 如果父自定义类型描述符已传递到<xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A>构造函数，GetEditor 方法将调用父级的相应方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The base type of the editor to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的编辑器基类型。

trans-unit.source: An editor of the given type that is to be associated with the class represented by this type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 要与此类型描述符所表示的类相关联的给定类型的编辑器。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of event descriptors for the object represented by this type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示此类型描述符的对象的事件描述符的集合。

trans-unit.source: If a parent custom type descriptor was passed into the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A> constructor, the GetEvents method will call the parent's corresponding method.
trans-unit.target: 如果父自定义类型描述符已传递到<xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A>构造函数，GetEvents 方法将调用父级的相应方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection"></xref> containing the event descriptors for the object represented by this type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection"> </xref>包含表示此类型描述符的对象的事件描述符。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a filtered collection of event descriptors for the object represented by this type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 返回经过筛选的事件说明符表示通过此类型描述符的对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: You can use the `attributes` parameter to filter the collection that is returned.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用`attributes`参数来筛选返回的集合。

trans-unit.source: If a parent custom type descriptor was passed into the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A> constructor, the GetEvents method will call the parent's corresponding method.
trans-unit.target: 如果父自定义类型描述符已传递到<xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A>构造函数，GetEvents 方法将调用父级的相应方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of attributes to use as a filter.
trans-unit.target: 要用作筛选器的特性数组。

trans-unit.source: This can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection"></xref> containing the event descriptions for the object represented by this type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection"> </xref>包含表示此类型描述符的对象的事件说明。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of property descriptors for the object represented by this type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示此类型描述符的对象的属性说明符集合。

trans-unit.source: If a parent custom type descriptor was passed into the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A> constructor, the GetProperties method will call the parent's corresponding method.
trans-unit.target: 如果父自定义类型描述符已传递到<xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A>构造函数，GetProperties 方法将调用父级的相应方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> containing the property descriptions for the object represented by this type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref>包含表示此类型描述符的对象的属性说明。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a filtered collection of property descriptors for the object represented by this type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 返回经过筛选的此类型描述符所表示的对象的属性说明符集合。

trans-unit.source: You can use the `attributes` parameter to filter the collection that is returned.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用`attributes`参数来筛选返回的集合。

trans-unit.source: For filtering rules, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关筛选规则，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a parent custom type descriptor was passed into the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A> constructor, the GetProperties method will call the parent's corresponding method.
trans-unit.target: 如果父自定义类型描述符已传递到<xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A>构造函数，GetProperties 方法将调用父级的相应方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of attributes to use as a filter.
trans-unit.target: 要用作筛选器的特性数组。

trans-unit.source: This can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> containing the property descriptions for the object represented by this type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref>包含表示此类型描述符的对象的属性说明。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that contains the property described by the specified property descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含指定的属性描述符所描述的属性的对象。

trans-unit.source: If a parent custom type descriptor was passed into the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A> constructor, the GetPropertyOwner method will call the parent's corresponding method.
trans-unit.target: 如果父自定义类型描述符已传递到<xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A>构造函数，GetPropertyOwner 方法将调用父级的相应方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The property descriptor for which to retrieve the owning object.
trans-unit.target: 针对其检索所属对象的属性描述符。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that owns the given property specified by the type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>拥有指定的类型描述符的给定的属性。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。
